title: A dialogue betwixt Jack and Will, concerning the Lord Mayor's going to meeting-houses with the sword carried before him, &c.
author: Ridpath, George, d. 1726.
notes: Attributed to George Ridpath. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
